mapper.insert: insert into t_user_cube ( create_date, modify_date, total_regist_count, day_regist_count, day_login_count, day_old_login_count, total_proj_count, day_proj_count ) values ( #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{totalRegistCount}, #{dayRegistCount}, #{dayLoginCount}, #{dayOldLoginCount}, #{totalProjCount}, #{dayProjCount} )
mapper.select: select * from t_user_cube order by create_date desc limit #{pager.start},#{pager.pageSize}
